tasks.label: Docker Compose Up Build
tasks.command: export HOST_IP=$(hostname -I | awk '{print $1}') && docker compose up --build

tasks.label: Docker Compose Up
tasks.command: export HOST_IP=$(hostname -I | awk '{print $1}') && docker compose up

tasks.label: Docker Compose Down
tasks.command: export HOST_IP=$(hostname -I | awk '{print $1}') && docker compose down
